name: Lithium (Balaji Veeramani)
description:
Summary

Lithium is an isometric tile-based puzzle game. Lead a cube through dangerous environments while conserving its power! Collect diamonds, evade enemies and recharge your batteries in this thoughtful puzzle game.

Controls

  • Arrowkeys to move
  • A & D to rotate camera
  • Spacebar to interact

Bugfixes

  • Collected diamonds no longer reset between levels
  • Fixed a bug where player could walk off stage
  • Player no longer phases through doors
  • Portals now redirect to the correct counterpart
  • Text animation stutter has been reduced
  • Fixed a bug where sound would not instantiate
  • Unwanted pixels on title image have been removed
